about_the_game:
Welcome to Chicken with Robot Legs!
You are a chicken that wakes up in an unknown place. Not knowing who you are or why are you there you know one thing, you gotta get out of there!
Explore a 2D pixel world with a lot of secrets and collectibles, the chicken doesn't stop moving forward, you'll need to use your abilities and environment to traverse and find a way out.

Features
- the first game that combines the Runner and the Metroidvania genres a "Runner-Vania" game.
- explore alternate paths to uncover secrets and collectibles.
- upgrade the chicken with abilities that help you reach for new places.
- never stop running, use the scenery and abilities in neat ways to get your way around.
- collect various kinds of items to get rewards or open secret paths.
